articles.content: A ransomware group named Rhysida has claimed it hacked Marvel's Spider-Man 2 developer Insomniac Games, and posted files it managed to gain access to as proof. Sony has since told Eurogamer it's inve… [+1446 chars]

articles.title: Here Are The 14 ‘Diablo 4’ Midwinter Blight Cosmetics, And How To Farm Them - Forbes
articles.description: Diablo 4 is finally offering cosmetics to grind during its Midwinter Blight event, which begins today. Here's how to farm them.
